token_state_bundle_extension.description: TokenStateBundle successfully extended with storage contribution metrics

default_storage_metrics.description: TokenStateBundle creates default storage metrics when none provided

storage_metrics_integration.description: StorageEngine can update TokenStateBundle with current node metrics

storage_metrics_schema.description: Storage contribution metrics schema implemented: storage_bytes_stored, storage_uptime_bucket, storage_proofs_verified

scoring_interface.description: OpenAGI scoring interface implemented with deterministic scalar scores

automatic_scoring.description: Content can be stored with automatic OpenAGI scoring

deterministic_scoring.description: Different content produces different deterministic scores
